data.name: Hoarseness or Raspy Voice
data.description: Rough, breathy, or strained voice quality.

data.name: Voice Fatigue
data.description: Tiredness or weakness of voice during or after speaking.

data.name: Voice Breaks
data.description: Sudden or uncontrollable changes in pitch or volume.

data.name: Reduced Vocal Range
data.description: Difficulty reaching high or low notes.

data.name: Tremor or Shaking in Voice
data.description: Uncontrolled trembling or shakiness in the voice.

data.name: Difficulty Speaking Loudly
data.description: Inability to project voice or speak at a normal volume.

data.name: Difficulty Speaking Softly
data.description: Inability to speak softly or whisper.

data.name: Vocal Effort
data.description: Excessive effort required to produce speech.

data.name: Vocal Strain
data.description: Feeling of strain or tension in the throat while speaking.

data.name: Breathiness
data.description: Excessive air leakage during speech, resulting in a weak or airy voice.

data.name: Sore Throat
data.description: Pain or discomfort in the throat, especially during or after speaking.

data.name: Throat Clearing
data.description: Frequent need to clear the throat due to irritation or discomfort.

data.name: Neck Pain
data.description: Pain or stiffness in the neck muscles, especially after speaking.

data.name: Ear Pain
data.description: Pain or discomfort in the ears, often associated with vocal strain.
